response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its true worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between the product's value and my goal to maximize its return. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction mutually beneficial.", "product_price": 13000}
